featured.text: Many people who are troubled by skin rashes caused by bug bites use “foggers,” or “bug bombs,” to get rid of the annoying crawlers in their homes.

definition.zh_def: 一種自動化程序，用於在互聯網上收集信息或數據。
definition.en_def: A type of automated program used to collect information or data from the internet.
definition.example: The search engine uses a crawler to index new web pages.
